Description:
Detects the presence of "bpf_probe_write_user" BPF helper-generated warning messages. Which could be a sign of suspicious eBPF activity on the system.

Author: Red Canary (idea), Nasreddine Bencherchali
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Suspicious BPF Activity - Linux
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where log like '%bpf_probe_write_user%'
